short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get notified of any deals and apply coupons automatically

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_U:
Save money and the planet with our eco-friendly shopping companion, Kindred Shop 'n Save. Shop smarter and greener for effortless savings and environmental impact.

Seamless Savings: Say goodbye to endless searches for coupon codes! Kindred simplifies your shopping journey by automatically finding & applying the best available discounts directly at checkout, ensuring you never miss a deal. 

Plant Trees, Shop Responsibly: With every purchase made through Kindred, we contribute to reforestation efforts worldwide. Be proud of your purchases knowing that a tree is planted, making your shopping not only budget-friendly but also planet-friendly. 

Effortless Experience: Kindred integrates with your Chrome browser, allowing you to shop from over 150k brands and over 550k deals hassle-free.  

Secure Shopping: Rest easy knowing we only ever show you what you have searched for, and never advertise brands. Your privacy and security are our top priorities. 

Join the Kindred community today and make a difference one purchase at a time. 
 

KINDRED'S PRIVACY PROMISE:  
 
We value your privacy. Rest assured that Kindred keeps your personal information confidential. We only show offers and deals relevant to your browser searches.  

LOVE KINDRED SHOP ‚ÄòN SAVE?  
 
Your feedback drives us forward! Please take a moment to rate our app and let us know what you think.
